AfricaBP 旨在促进生物多样性基因组学和生物信息学领域的基层知识交流自 2021 年启动以来，非洲生物基因组计划 (AfricaBP) 在实现未来 10 年内对 100,000 个非洲特有物种进行测序的宏伟目标方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AfricaBP-aims-to-foster-grassroots-knowledge-exchange-in-biodiversity-genomics-and-bioinformatics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230913/AfricaBP-aims-to-foster-grassroots-knowledge-exchange-in-biodiversity-genomics-and-bioinformatics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84aaa838-68bd-4b2c-a7c4-55d7465a5a1e Wed, 13 Sep 2023 11:45:52 -0400 AfricaBP aims to foster grassroots knowledge exchange in biodiversity genomics and bioinformatics
